name: Smart Alt Generator
author: Ash Tools

sections.description:
The Smart Alt Generator plugin revolutionizes image SEO and accessibility on WordPress sites using AI technology. It automatically generates SEO-friendly alt text for images, boosts visibility in search engines, and enhances accessibility in 11 different languages: English, Spanish, Chinese, Hindi, Arabic, French, Russian, Portuguese, German, Japanese, and Italian. The plugin is easy to use, integrates with the WordPress media library, and operates with minimal setup. The basic version allows for recognition and auto-generation of alt text for up to 50 images. Register for an API key from External Service to connect and start optimizing your site’s images for SEO and accessibility.

Key Features

  • AI-Powered Alt Text: Automatically generates descriptive alt text for images, enhancing SEO and accessibility.
  • Multilingual Support: Supports alt text generation in 11 languages – English, Spanish, Chinese, Hindi, Arabic, French, Russian, Portuguese, German, Japanese, and Italian.
  • Seamless WordPress Integration: Works with your existing media library for a smooth workflow.
  • Easy to Use: Simple setup and operation, no advanced skills required.
  • Accessibility Improvement: Makes your site more accessible to users with visual impairments.
  • SEO Enhancement: Improves image search rankings with keyword-rich alt text.
  • Generous Free Version: Recognize and generate alt text for up to 50 images with the basic free version.
  • Powered by External API: Utilizes Smart Alt service for high-quality alt text generation.

External Service

This plugin relies on the Smart Alt service to generate alt text. Ensure compliance with their terms and privacy policy:

Service URL: https://smart-alt.com/
Terms of Service: https://smart-alt.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://smart-alt.com/privacy
sections.installation:
1. Upload the smart-alt-generator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Register and obtain an API key from External Service.
  4. Enter your API key in the Smart Alt Generator settings in your WordPress dashboard.
sections.faq:
How do I obtain an API key?

Register at External Service to generate an API key in your account settings.

Is the API key required?

Yes, it connects your site with the service for alt text generation.

Is Smart Alt Generator free?

The basic version is free and allows for alt text generation for up to 50 images. Premium features may require a subscription.
